_sText:
Hello!

I had an idea, to create a map where there is darkness, through which the light goes every time, where the opening doors are opened. The map contains the original gravity, for speed dialing at the very beginning, after which you should not crash into the doors!

In the beginning there is a quiet song.

At the end of the card there is a small bonus of jumping 64 units.

I want to note that I did not have a map for 1 day from scratch)

I really hope that you will enjoy playing on my map!

Have a good game!
